price: Kuma Allah ke da* (mallakar) abin da ke cikin sammai da kuma abin da ke cikin ƙasa kuma Allah Yã kasance, a dukkan, kõme, Mai kẽwayewa.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٖ مُّحِيطٗا
footnotes: * Ko da yake Allah Yã riƙi Ibrãhĩma "Khalĩl" watau masõyi, amma bai hana Ibrahĩma ya zama a cikin bãyin Allah kuma mulkinSa ba, domin yana daga cikin abin da sama da ƙasa suka ƙunsa a cikin su.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wakāna al-lahu bikulli shayin muḥīṭan
